title: Onlook
name: onlook
description: Open-source, AI-powered visual editor for React apps. Self-hosted version with Supabase backend.
note: Onlook self-hosted. After first deploy, access at your chosen URL to create the first account. Important: You must mount your prepared repo (with the two .env files) to /app before first start.

volumes.description: Mount the cloned Onlook repo here (must contain apps/web/client/.env and apps/web/server/.env)

env.name: NEXTAUTH_URL
env.label: NextAuth URL (external)
env.description: Exact public URL you will use (must match both .env files)

env.name: NEXT_PUBLIC_NEXTAUTH_URL
env.label: NextAuth URL (public)
env.description: Same value as above â€“ required for the client
